items.sentence: Upon explaining plosives to his class, the linguistics teacher instantly became covered in spit.
Tom was so tired that he fell asleep on the sofa before Mary had finished making him a sandwich.
After removing her glasses and untying her hair, Mary looked like a completely different person.
I probably won't be able to understand most of Tom's speech, since he'll be giving it in French.
Though my understanding of French grammar isn't very good, I can usually make myself understood.
